titles.title: Construction Consensus Procurement Improvement Act of 2020
To prohibit the use of reverse auctions for design and construction services procurements, and for other purposes.
Construction Consensus Procurement Improvement Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Construction Consensus Procurement Improvement Act of 2020
This bill prohibits the use of reverse auctions for awarding federal contracts for construction and design services. Generally, a reverse auction is one in which there are multiple sellers lowering their bids to win a supply or service contract.
